This small family restaurant is tucked away in a quaint passageway near the Gothic quarter.  We had lunch there, and it was very good.  My fondest memory of our meal was the dessert, which was incredible.  Desserts are made daily, and the white chocolate cheesecake (with preserved cherries) was a knockout.   Check out the dessert case on the counter to start your mouth watering.   Prices are very reasonable. .
